languages.text: "Канистрой" его прозвали за любовь держать под рукой емкость-другую с {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометием{/g} — ему нравилось жечь. Ох и попил же он крови в свое время... как давно это было? Шестьдесят лет назад? Я как раз на флоте последние дни служил, когда пришла новость об очередном его нападении..."

"They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."
languages.original_text: "Канистрой" его прозвали за любовь держать под рукой емкость-другую с {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометием{/g} — ему нравилось жечь. Ох и попил же он крови в свое время... как давно это было? Шестьдесят лет назад? Я как раз на флоте последние дни служил, когда пришла новость об очередном его нападении..."

traits.locale_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of promethium ready at hand — he did love burning things. Boy, was he a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years back? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came about his latest attack..."

"They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of promethium ready at hand — he did love burning things. Boy, was he a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years back? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came about his latest attack..."

"They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of promethium on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

"They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of promethium on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

"They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

languages.text: “‘油罐’是当时的人给他起的绰号，因为他总是习惯随手带上一两罐{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}。他确实很喜欢烧东西。噢，可不是嘛，他那时候确实是个大麻烦……那都是多少年前的事情了？六十年前？我最后一次听说他袭击别人的时候，还是我在海军服役的最后那段日子……”
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: “‘油罐’是当时的人给他起的绰号，因为他总是习惯随手带上一两罐{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}。他确实很喜欢烧东西。噢，可不是嘛，他那时候确实是个大麻烦……那都是多少年前的事情了？六十年前？我最后一次听说他袭击别人的时候，还是我在海军服役的最后那段日子……”

languages.text: «Le llamaban "Bidones" porque siempre llevaba {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} encima; le encantaba el fuego. Sí, era todo un peligro... ¿cuántos años hace de aquello? ¿Sesenta? Es mis últimos días en la Armada llegaban noticias de sus asaltos...».
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: «Le llamaban "Bidones" porque siempre llevaba {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} encima; le encantaba el fuego. Sí, era todo un peligro... ¿cuántos años hace de aquello? ¿Sesenta? Es mis últimos días en la Armada llegaban noticias de sus asaltos...».

languages.text: 「常に{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}をひとつかふたつ持ち歩いていたため、『ジェリカン』というあだ名が付けられたのです…彼はいろんな物を燃やすのが大好きでした。ええ、相当手こずらされましたね…どのくらい前でしょう？もう60年前になるでしょうか？海軍で最後の日々を過ごしていた際に、彼の直近の襲撃に関するニュースが飛び込んできました…」
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: 「常に{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}をひとつかふたつ持ち歩いていたため、『ジェリカン』というあだ名が付けられたのです…彼はいろんな物を燃やすのが大好きでした。ええ、相当手こずらされましたね…どのくらい前でしょう？もう60年前になるでしょうか？海軍で最後の日々を過ごしていた際に、彼の直近の襲撃に関するニュースが飛び込んできました…」

languages.text: "Den Spitznamen 'Kanister' hat er erhalten, weil er immer einen oder zwei davon mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} bei sich trug – er steckte gerne alles Mögliche in Brand. Ja, er war damals eine echte Bedrohung ... wir lange ist das her? Sechzig Jahre? Ich stand kurz vor dem Ende meiner Dienstzeit in der Flotte, als die Nachricht von seinem neuesten Angriff eintraf ..."
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: "Den Spitznamen 'Kanister' hat er erhalten, weil er immer einen oder zwei davon mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} bei sich trug – er steckte gerne alles Mögliche in Brand. Ja, er war damals eine echte Bedrohung ... wir lange ist das her? Sechzig Jahre? Ich stand kurz vor dem Ende meiner Dienstzeit in der Flotte, als die Nachricht von seinem neuesten Angriff eintraf ..."

languages.text: « Il était réputé pour avoir toujours un bidon de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} sous la main, d'où son surnom de Jerrycan. Il faut dire qu'il aimait mettre le feu un peu partout. Oh oui, c'était un criminel d'envergure il y a, quoi... soixante ans ? J'ai le souvenir d'avoir entendu parler de sa dernière attaque quand je finissais mon service dans la marine... »
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: « Il était réputé pour avoir toujours un bidon de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} sous la main, d'où son surnom de Jerrycan. Il faut dire qu'il aimait mettre le feu un peu partout. Oh oui, c'était un criminel d'envergure il y a, quoi... soixante ans ? J'ai le souvenir d'avoir entendu parler de sa dernière attaque quand je finissais mon service dans la marine... »

languages.text: "Ona 'Bidon' lakabını takmalarının sebebi, elinin altında her daim bir iki bidon {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g} bulundurmasıydı. Ateşle oynamayı severdi rahmetli. O zamanlar çok can yakmıştı. Ne zamandı? Altmış yıl önce miydi? Son saldırısının haberi duyulduğunda Donanma'dan ayrılmak için gün sayıyordum."
languages.original_text: "They nicknamed him 'Jerrycan' for his habit of having a jug or two of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} on hand — he did love burning things. Oh yes, he was a menace back then... how long ago was it? Sixty years ago? I was serving my last days in the Navy when news came of his latest attack..."

traits.locale_text: "Ona 'Bidon' lakabını takmalarının sebebi, elinin altında her zaman birkaç bidon {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g} bulundurmasıydı. Ateşle oynamayı severdi rahmetli. O zamanlar çok can yakmıştı. Ne zamandı? Altmış yıl önce miydi? Son saldırısının haberi duyulduğunda Donanma'dan ayrılmak için gün sayıyordum..."
